p: Fresh and dried plant extracts of the various solvents (aqueous, acetone & ethanol) were weighed and dissolved in dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO). They were then all sonicated for proper solubilization and stored at -20Â°C. The plant extracts were then diluted in RPMI-1640 supplemented with 5% fetal bovine serum (FBS) and streptomycin medium to its final concentrations.
